statements: SELECT * FROM student_records;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_email FROM student_records;
SELECT student_name, student_phone, certification_id FROM student_records WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM student_records WHERE student_email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT student_name, course_id FROM student_records ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_records WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM student_records WHERE certification_id = 5 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_email, course_id FROM student_records WHERE student_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_phone FROM student_records WHERE course_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY student_name ASC, student_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT certification_id) AS total_certifications, course_id FROM student_records GROUP BY course_id HAVING total_certifications > 1 ORDER BY course_id ASC;
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth FROM student_records;
SELECT student_id, student_name, contact_number FROM student_records ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM program_certifications WHERE certification_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, certification_name, certification_date FROM program_certifications WHERE certification_name LIKE '%Java%';
SELECT student_id, student_name, address FROM student_records WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth FROM student_records ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC
SELECT student_name, contact_number FROM student_records WHERE date_of_birth > '2000-01-01'
SELECT * FROM student_records WHERE address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT student_name, certification_name, certification_date FROM student_records INNER JOIN program_certifications ON student_records.student_id = program_certifications.student_id
SELECT student_id, certification_name FROM program_certifications ORDER BY certification_date
SELECT * FROM student_records;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM student_records WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, join_date FROM student_records ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM certification_details WHERE certification_id = 2;
SELECT course_name, course_date FROM course_history WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM student_records WHERE student_name = 'Alice';
SELECT student_name, join_date FROM student_records WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, certification_name, certification_date FROM student_records JOIN certification_details ON student_records.student_id = certification_details.student_id;
SELECT student_name, course_name, course_date FROM student_records JOIN course_history ON student_records.student_id = course_history.student_id;

SELECT student_name, certification_name, course_name FROM student_records JOIN certification_details ON student_records.student_id = certification_details.student_id JOIN course_history ON certification_details.certification_id = course_history.certification_id;
SELECT * FROM student_records;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM student_records WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_date, instructor FROM course_history ORDER BY course_date DESC;
SELECT certification_name, issuing_organization, expiration_date FROM certification_details WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_name, program_duration, lead_instructor FROM teacher_training_programs WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM student_records;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM student_records WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT issuing_organization, certification_name, expiration_date FROM certification_details ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_date, instructor FROM course_history WHERE student_id = 3 AND course_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_name, program_duration, location FROM teacher_training_programs WHERE program_duration > 30 ORDER BY program_duration ASC;
SELECT * FROM student_records;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM student_records;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date, issuing_organization FROM certification_details;
SELECT program_name, duration, start_date FROM program_details;
SELECT course_name, instructor, completion_date FROM course_history;
SELECT * FROM student_records;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM student_records ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT certification_name, issuing_organization FROM certification_details WHERE certification_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT program_name, duration, start_date FROM program_details WHERE duration >= 12 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, program_id, enrollment_date FROM student_program_relations ORDER BY student_id, enrollment_date DESC;
